name: Merge Master - Elden Warrior
description:
Merge Elden Warrior is an epic strategy battle where you can control your glorious medieval elden army.

You can choose among various combinations of medieval knights and archers to fight against the opponents. They have big boss, dragons, titans so it will be challenging to conquer them.

Create a tactics to win against the final boss. Every strategic decision matters in this game.

You can grow your warriors, samurais, ninjas, knights, templars, archers or mage by simply combining the same unit. The new unit will be a lot stronger and ready to fight for you

Get ready to become the master tactician in the elden medieval wars.
